mapper.select: SELECT P.ID, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.CREATED_AT, P.UPDATED_AT, P.VIEW_COUNT, P.USER_ID, P.CATEGORY, U.NICKNAME AS userNickname FROM POSTS P LEFT JOIN USERS U ON P.USER_ID = U.LOGIN_ID ORDER BY P.ID DESC

SELECT P.ID, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.CREATED_AT, P.UPDATED_AT, P.VIEW_COUNT, P.USER_ID, P.CATEGORY, U.NICKNAME AS userNickname FROM POSTS P LEFT JOIN USERS U ON P.USER_ID = U.LOGIN_ID WHERE P.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY P.ID DESC

SELECT P.ID, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.CREATED_AT, P.UPDATED_AT, P.VIEW_COUNT, P.USER_ID, P.CATEGORY, U.NICKNAME AS userNickname FROM POSTS P LEFT JOIN USERS U ON P.USER_ID = U.LOGIN_ID WHERE P.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE POSTS SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE POSTS SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
